title: I feel strange when it rains, or when it's cloudy. I feel like there is something familiar, like a memory, but I can never remember anything. Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: You’re either a person with emotional connection to this weather, I feel emotional to sunsets. And/or you have some deep past life memories connected to this scenery.
It might be you subconcious mind playing with you. Don’t bother about it. If you get to remember, thats fine. If you don’t, enjoy the rain atleast. Stay happy!
